website_summaries.verdict: Logitech wins again with the Wireless Boombox for iPad, delivering a speaker that sounds great and won't empty your wallet. We recommend it for stationary indoor and outdoor use, but portable music lovers should keep shopping.
pros: Powered by eight drivers, the Logitech Wireless Boombox for iPad uses Bluetooth connectivity to play music wirelessly from Bluetooth devices, including the iPad and other tablets
cons: Its bulky stature is best for stationary use, and competitive models offer slightly diminished sonic quality in a much smaller candy-bar design

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly durable, but battery doesn't last.
customer_reviews.text: Ive had mine for probably 8 years now. The battery has been dead for the past few years. It has not been able to hold a charge since... 2014 or so. However I still use it almost every day. I just keep it plugged in all the time. Its been abused on construction sites most of the time. Ive dropped it a couple times. It been in very dusty conditions most of the time as well. Still sounds as good as it always has surprisingly. Its certainly not as loud as most of the other "Jobsite" radios out there, but it works for me. Im going to continue to use it until it finally blows I guess haha.
customer_reviews.author: MikeyBeans

customer_reviews.title: Wow.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this portable Bluetooth speaker for my brother for his birthday to use with his Android smartphone. (Despite the title of the product and packaging, the speaker works perfectly with non-Apple devices as long as they support Bluetooth, like Android smartphones and tablets. I have no idea why Logitech does this as it can cause confusion.) I'm somewhat jealous as I have Logitech's wireless USB speaker Z515 myself and although its sound is great, it can't hold itself against this. Just phenomenal sound. If you must absolutely have the best mobile sound for your smartphone or tablet, this is one of the contenders for its price point. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Iacobus

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Not Working
customer_reviews.text: I have owned one of these for a while, so I decided to order a second one for a different area of the house. I like the original product, but this one arrived "Not working". It would pair, but not play music. Would not even play music through the 3.55MM connection. I contacted logitech support and they indicated I should perform a "Factory reset", which also didn't work. It wouldn't reset using their instructions. I hope I just received a defective item. I am returning it for hopefully a better one. I always get concerned now adays with all of the boot-legged or very cheaply made products. I hope this supplier is legit. Returning tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: Jim S

customer_reviews.title: Okay speakers but Bluetooth connection and battery life frustrating
customer_reviews.text: it has nice sound, better when plugged in. my reason for 3 stars is A) the battery no longer holds a charge. it stopped after about a year. that's pretty annoying. B) switching from one bluetooth device to another only seems to work if the controlling device cancels the connection before another device tries to pick it up. if you don't cancel the first connection it won't be seen by other devices. i have held buttons ins, turned them on and off an doesn't recognize. this gets annoying when someone who may be using a phone leaves and others try to connect to the speakers.
customer_reviews.author: T. Koch

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound - Only links 1 device!
customer_reviews.text: This came so highly recommended that I bought it for my wife and initially, when I set it up on a test with my iPhone, it worked great! Set it up, BOOMING sound, all great! Then........when I gave it to her and we tried to set up HER iPhone.....nothing.....does not recognize. Linked directly.....nothing....no devices found....... Called/emailed Logitech.....clear memory....link....BOOM.....great, works like a charm. Link my phone? Nope. Her phone OFF? yes, her phone un-connected? Yup. Link my phone? No freaking way.........then Logitech stopped answering my emails. Screwball.........simply screwball. Buy another Bluetooth speaker 'cause it ain't worth the trouble.....
customer_reviews.author: Frank Jelnicky

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like this speaker for a few reasons, despite its very nice price. First, some of the higher pitched sounds had that tinny quality which I could not get past. And there was a noticeable difference in sound quality when it was plugged in vs just running on battery. Bass was overall decent. Battery life was pretty good. I ended up shelling out the money for a Bose Soundlink (the original one), which I have been very happy with for a larger speaker. I also recently purchased a Cyren Photive and Roverbeats T3 for the office, which are amazing values for a smaller speaker.
customer_reviews.author: spideyns

customer_reviews.title: This speaker is a beast!
customer_reviews.text: I truly believe that this speaker is the best in it's price range. I've had 2 of them. When the first one died after 4 years of rough treatment and being dropped countless times, I tried dozens of similarly priced bluetooth speakers. Some from superior brands. Each time, I was disappointed. I ended up getting another Logitech Boombox, even though the price had went up $60, since I purchased the first one in 2012. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Dedrick F. Bowers

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work great anymore
customer_reviews.text: As new review Item works great. "Installed" in less than 1 minute and hasn't failed us yet. Can't say anything about the battery life since it's been mostly connected to an outlet, but sound is good either way. After using it for a while, I now think this product is not really good. Here are the issues: If you move the boombox or the ipad, you lose the connection momentarily or it keeps stuttering For some reason connection doesn't work well in the sun (outside) Range is a problem Can only connect to 1 device at a time. YOu need to restart the unit if you want to connect another device
customer_reviews.author: Tricolor

customer_reviews.title: Just acceptable audio quality.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a small speaker that sounded not necessary loud but clean and full to used on my house patio when doing BBQ, have small meeting or any other activity where good sound is needed. This is not the case. Bluetooth compresses (this means it gets rid of parts of the audio signal) audio so much that what you here on the speaker feels like its empty. If you are looking for great audio, keep looking. Now, on the portability side this unit shines. Its great for the beach or anywhere alike. It does has an audio input to use with not BT enabled devices. That way it does sounds better not not great.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro M. Dinas

customer_reviews.title: Va-Va Boom....
customer_reviews.text: The unit arrived from the USofA this afternoon - and 2 hours later I'm in raptures! So easy to set-up, easy to use...sound is wonderful, sound reproduction crystal clear. How far we've come, technologically speaking. It seems like only yesterday I was looking at mini hi-fi systems to upgrade my ageing stereo components. Actually, it was three weeks ago....and then I did some research, then more research, and then further research and then further, further research and decided this speaker system was the one for me. Buy this - you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Bloodnock

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great for its compact size
customer_reviews.text: This little speaker sounds great for its small size. Component style sounds with compact type of convenience. It automatically links up with a bluetooth device when there is no 3.5mm cable connected to it, so you dont have to do anything to connect. It automatically turns down the bass output a little if you are running off the internal battery and not plugged into a 110v outlet. Ive never checked how long it will run on a full charge but I've played outside at a picnic with it for hours and my phone battery died before the battery in the speaker died. Great little unit
customer_reviews.author: Catfinger

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great Bluetooth speakers!! The sound is great. Smooth sound and nice and loud. Love it!! Definitely sounds better with it plugged in but it's not a issue for me.
customer_reviews.author: SarahP

customer_reviews.title: Fills the room with good sound
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves using Pandora with this device. It is used all the time with her iphone 4S Probably the most cost-effective birthday present I've gotten her. Easy to pair, great sound, very portable. I agree with other reviewers who have said it loses some of the bass when running on its battery. However my wife keeps it plugged in and moves it from room to room occasionally. She is listening the Pandora's holiday compilation now as she decorates for Christmas. She enjoys the freedom of easily and quickly skipping less favorite tracks using her iphone with Pandora. Bruce
customer_reviews.author: Coyote

customer_reviews.title: Best overall bluetooth speaker
customer_reviews.text: This thing has great battery life and great sound, for the size. I own or have owned over 50 portable speakers, and this one tops them all if you consider all of the features. It's a shame that Logitech makes a great speaker, then makes a terrible one every couple of years. Anyone remember the stellar mm50 followed up by the less awesome Pure-Fi "update"? Well, the "update" to this is the $100 more expensive UE Boombox, which doesn't hold a candle to this in terms of sound quality. Get one of these if you can find one at a decent price. It may be at least another year before Logitech makes something good again.
customer_reviews.author: Wendal Weets

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker
customer_reviews.text: Use these speakers regularly. Sound is great when plugged in to the wall. When running in battery power, gets noticeably quieter, with a narrower range of tones, when on battery. Speaker needs to be pointing at you for maximum enjoyment
customer_reviews.author: Libertatum

customer_reviews.title: This is the one! Excellent Sound, Simple to set up A+++
customer_reviews.text: I've tried at least 5 different players that will work with an iphone, ipad, mp3 player and all of them have been returned. This one, on the other hand, is worth every penny. Plays like a Boze system with clear lovely sound. Good rich sound. NOTHING tinny or staticy about this system. Is a breeze to set up and use. I wanted something i could use at home and on the road. Sound is better than my full sized stereo system. Bluetooth is highly responsive whether i am in my office, living room or kitchen. I take my ipad with me and control everything from music selection to volume from the ipad itself.
customer_reviews.author: B. Jansson

customer_reviews.title: I was sent the non Bluetooth model
customer_reviews.text: I was sent the wrong model without Bluetooth this is the one with the iPhone dock but it was advertised as the wireless one
customer_reviews.author: BIGMAN

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker!!  Portability is a nice plus...
customer_reviews.text: This little speaker is great! It has some nice low tones for it's size and warm mids and highs. It wont shake your walls, but it can definitely fill up a room. People complained about the sound quality/volume being low when unplugged... here's the deal. When you unplug it, the volume goes down but then you can use the volume button and turn it back up. I read somewhere that the two bigger woofers turn off all together, but without being too scientific, it seems like you can achieve the same sound by turning the volume back up once you unplug it. Inexpensive compared to other options although I have not compared them... I love this thing!!
customer_reviews.author: MajorGoods

customer_reviews.title: No Mid-Range and No Adjustments
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife after reading all the rave reviews for the sound. This unit has a lot of bass, but very poor mid-range (organ, snare, horns, etc.). The worst part is that there are no adjustments for anything! No bass, no treble! Unthinkable. I also thought that it had blue tooth and an I-Pod dock; it's either one or the other. I didn't read well or notice the "choice button" when I ordered. The sound is pretty good, but could be better. She has a flap door on her Otter box and it still won't plug into the dock, just as a lot of people have said before.
customer_reviews.author: Cajun Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality, long battery life. Works exactly as described; bluetooth was easy to synch and I am not a techy. Excellent value. Product enhancements that would make this excellent overall: Storage case or bag; a way to hang this item up on a wall; make it in white as well. Try to make it a little taller and less wide - would fit better on table or other surface. Those improvements aside, this is a great product and I would recommend it since I did not find another product at this price with the enhancements I recommended.
customer_reviews.author: FreqBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped charging after only 1 week of use
customer_reviews.text: Loved this device when I first got it. But then I noticed that the indicator light that is supposed to be flashing when your charging the boombox via AC was not on. There was no light at all...indicating no charge. Sure enough.....I tried playing the boombox without it being connected to the AC (battery mode) and it went immediatley to red indiciating less than 20 mins of usage left per the instructional manual. So I am sending it back due to it being defective. Too bad.....but I am definitely getting a replacement since I loved the sound and size.
customer_reviews.author: Firstinlastout

customer_reviews.title: Great Speaker for the Cost
customer_reviews.text: After painfully looking at what affordable Bluetooth Speaker would work with the new iPad3 and iPhone 4s, I found this speaker. Although I tried their Mini Boombox, the "syncing" and sound was not there for me. Although this is larger in size, it is the same size as the Creative D200. I find the "syncing" of this speaker the easiest I have experienced. I can turn off the iPad3 or this speaker and it syncs immediately! It has been a great find! Thanks Logitech! Too bad it is not on the Apple web site.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Rubin

customer_reviews.title: Great and amazing speaker
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker the quality of the sound was amazing great voice great bass Very loud love it!
customer_reviews.author: MOISES

customer_reviews.title: Great, when it works
customer_reviews.text: This unit makes a great first impression, it looks great, and sounds great. Unfortunately, that first impression does not last. The first unit shipped as a present kept powering down after a minute or two, no matter what volume the iPhone was set to. The replacement unit had a different problem - after the second week, the bluetooth functionality stopped working. I'm trying for a third unit, because it's a gift, and because Amazon Prime is so easy. I'll try to follow up with more news with the third unit.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient
customer_reviews.text: This little guy pumps out great sound! It does much better plugged in, but even in battery mode it had plenty of volume to make the mood at a pool party this weekend. Operation is a cinch. iPhone users like me should know that you can adjust the volume from your phone to a certain extent, but speaker has a volume button on it that provides additional control. (I.e. don't assume that maxing the volume on your phone means that's as loud as the speaker gets - you can still turn it up louder!) Excellent value for this price!
customer_reviews.author: Austin.Boomerang

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for a long time
customer_reviews.text: I used this until I killed it. I was very happy with it. Sound, battery, size, shape. All good.
customer_reviews.author: jamey

customer_reviews.title: Great portable speakers for the yard and teaching dance!
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker! The sound is good, considering the portability device. I love bass and even though this isn't as powerful in mobile mode versus plugged-in mode, it still delivers a good sound. Highly recommend for any dance teacher instructor or party host :D Only downside is the battery: After about over a years use, the battery doesn't hold a long enough charge for mobile use. At least it has an easy access to replace it with a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Creative Designer

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound and great look
customer_reviews.text: This is the old model but i do not see why they would change it as it Rocks! and I think it looks great and is very functional. Its definitely louder when plugged in but the sound is still very good when on battery. I have several other blue tooth speakers and this blows them away, especially the more expensive smaller Jambox. For the money it is so much better sounding than the jambox. I can listen to it in my backyard and its almost loud enough to piss my neighbors off but still very clear with little distortion at the max.
customer_reviews.author: NH3MAN

customer_reviews.title: but don't sound as good as this lightweight little unit
customer_reviews.text: I've owned 2 generations of the Klipsch Room Groove models which are 5 star themselves, but don't sound as good as this lightweight little unit. The Bluetooth is seamless, I can walk all around my 2 story 2400sq.ft house with no signal loss. And what really nice is that you can still control the volume from your iPod. The is a bit of volume loss when running on battery, but nothing thats to complain about.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Gerstle

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Sounds way better than i expected. It's light and the battery does last a long time. I'm listening to music a lot more around the house and in more places. I would purchase it again, though I'd prefer to pay $100. Only 'issue': The ideal scenario with this device is that you will pair it with one device and leave it that way. If you are using multiple devices/computers it can sometimes be a headache to have it "forget" the other device (if it's in the area with bluetooth still on) and pair with the new device.
customer_reviews.author: J. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves this
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife for Christmas, and she loves it. Hooks up to her iPad via Bluetooth, and she can take her iPad and/or the speaker with here anywhere she goes in the house. Wireless is a plus. I got tired of listening to her play music through the tinny little iPad speakers, or her old computer speakers. Needed to hear a little bass! This item fit the bill. Sounds terrific and works as advertised. She's happy, I'm happy. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Hoss Peterson

customer_reviews.title: The sound is absolutely AMAZING!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this thing for two years and it's still going strong. I've probably purchased 4-6 other bluetooth speakers and nothing even comes close. It's light weight and packs an incredibly rich and deep sounds when plugged in (sound is WAY less when on battery). I've had higher end SONY, JVC, Soundfreaq, and others. I would absolutely buy this again but why? It doesn't even break a sweat after all this time.... truly a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Petebank

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this speaker as a replacement for an ancient CD/Radio combination. This Logitech Bluetooth Speaker gives rich, room-filling sound at a very reasonable price. At first, pairing with the adapter (also reviewed) was a bit challenging, but I believe that was an issue with the operator rather than the equipment. After we figured it out, we found the range to be exceptional and the sound to be clear and rich, with excellent bass tones.
customer_reviews.author: H. J. Elston

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound, excellent build quality
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. I use it with my bluetooth enabled Atrix 4G Android phone and PowerAmp player. Bluetooth connects flawlessly. Sound is more than impressive. It can go as loud as I need it and has a true balanced high fidelity range. PowerAmp includes an equalizer and I can tune the sound for individual albums very easily. Battery could last longer, but it is great to be able to just stick it up on a window sill and play it totally unconnected to any wires. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Ingraham

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great!  Needs remote.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Sounds fantastic (especially for price). Bluetooth connection to iPhone is effortless. Setup involves no more than taking it out of the box and plugging it in (battery means that you don't need to leave it plugged in, however). Cons: No remote! Blue light flashes when no bluetooth device is attached. Overall: Great deal! It could definitely use a remote since I feel the need to turn it off when I go to sleep due to the lights on the front of the unit.
customer_reviews.author: BR

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: As noted in other reviews, this isn't meant to replace your subwoofer/speaker set in your home. However, for use in a smaller room or outside when you want something portable, it's great. Even though the volume and bass diminish a bit when running on battery, it still sounds very good. When plugged in, it sounds great. Surprising for a boombox this size. I also listened to the Bose Soundlink and I like the sound of the Logitech better and it's $180 cheaper. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Crispeto

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. Sounds awesome. Plenty of bass and a balanced sound. Good sound quality and a surprising amount of volume. Battery life is also much better than I expected. At about 60% volume I'll get almost 4 hours. Would buy it again for sure. Only downfall is when multiple devices try to connect to it it bugs out sometimes and ends up locking out both devices until you reset it. If more than one person will be using the Bluetooth audio functionality make sure to disable bluetooth on your device after you are done using it so the next person can connect without a problem.
customer_reviews.author: RI

customer_reviews.title: Nice Wireless Soundbox
customer_reviews.text: I really like this unit and have found multiple uses. I use it around the house, on the patio, and in the basement when using the treadmill. In all cases, it has great sound.....even better when plugged directly into phone/tablet/receiver/etc because of better power output. I even use it as a distractor for the noisy neighbors and their basketball court right next to my house LOL. I simply place the box in the window sill in their direction and let it blast. It has good directional sound, so I can drown them out without distrubing the interior sounds of my own home. How's that for a product plug.
customer_reviews.author: 1 Step Closer

customer_reviews.title: Takes a beating
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't ever review things online, but I figured I'd take the time on this speaker because of one incident in particular. I was jumping out of the bed of my truck when the speaker slipped from my hands and fell about 5 feet to the concrete parking lot. It was truly an electronic owners worst nightmare. I am giving this product 5 stars because not only does it perform magnificently, it survived that fall with ease. I wouldn't recommend attempting this again, but it is a pretty solid product.
customer_reviews.author: AnotheRunner

customer_reviews.title: Great portable Radio
customer_reviews.text: I took this radio to Aruba and used it everyday on the beach and every night in my hotel room. I love the recharging feature and the aux cord that it comes with. I did not use the wireless feature because my old ipod does not have bluetooth technology. The battery life is very long, and the light changes color to let you know when it is wearing down. When it is not plugged in you do lose a little bit of volume and bass but I didn't mind. The sound is very clear and good. Overall great little radio to take places and have fun with.
customer_reviews.author: Aja Boogie

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I own several other Logitech products including computer speakers, mouse, keyboards (wireless and bluetooth), and they all are excellent. This speaker is portable with great sound and half the price of Bose. Super easy to connect to any of your devices (I use Ipad and Iphone). You will get higher volume and greater bass when plugged in but just as good when not. Buttons are not lit up so using when dark is a slight issue but otherwise perfect. Do not confuse this speaker with the previous, older model 7XX. This one has none of those flaws.
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: the devise is not working (cannot be charge)
customer_reviews.text: unfortenly this time i am very disapointment from this bying! i brought it home my wife using it for giving lactures i the university (she connect it to her laptop) and she told me thaht the speakers were declining during her presentation. i tryied to charge the unit at home but the devise did not charge! when i connect the devise ti the electrical outlet i get red light ( not charge) and afther 1 minute the devise shut up itself! i can not charge it! either the charger is not doing is work or the littum batteries are completly empety and cannot be charge! what can i do? beside a nww charger and a new battery?
customer_reviews.author: boaz cohen

customer_reviews.title: Wow, Logitech hits it out of the Park again.
customer_reviews.text: This device is AWESOME!!! Great sound, portability, and bluetooth linked up so easy. My wife and I are fighting over it to use with our iphones. Bass is incredible for the size. Haven't tried the battery to determine how long it lasts, but it sounded so good that I wanted to post this. I have been so pleased with Logitech devices and their customer service is the best (found out from a remote that I had problems with). Well worth the money. GatorMan
customer_reviews.author: T. Lutrick

customer_reviews.title: Muffled Mid-Range Sound
customer_reviews.text: This item had such poor mid-range sound quality that I contacted Logitech. They said it was defective and sent me the non-bluetooth item in exchange. I'm still going back and forth with them, but based on my experience, I'd stay away from it. Typically, I've been happy with Logitech products and with their customer service, but this experience is definitely a black mark. I'll update this review to let you know the ultimate outcome.
customer_reviews.author: Bit of a Geek

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I own two of these - the one with the dock and the one with Bluetooth - and have been extremely happy with both. For a unit this size the sound quality is excellent, the quality of the materials is great, and it's easy to use. I keep ours centrally located in the kitchen and can hear it throughout the house. Would not hesitate to recommend this speaker!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Garnett

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed, the sound quality was great, but it stopped working after 1year of light use. The bluetooth button to connect devices just completely stopped responding.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: SO SOLID FOR THE MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for a couple weeks and the blue tooth is awesome and the speaker works great. Sounds better plugged in as most people say but honestly, all it took was bringing this speaker outside and jamming some killer tunes while I chopped down some bush in the driveway and I was sold. The sound is really good and its loud enough to bother my neighbors. Setting up the blue tooth took all of about 8 seconds. This product could not be much better for the price.
customer_reviews.author: KYLE

customer_reviews.title: KIDS LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one each for my son and daughter, they use them all the time and everywhere, they are pretty sturdy, sound is much better while plugged in, it looses some bass when using them with the rechargeable battery. There is one les expensive version that uses regular batteries, I will recommend to spend a little more money and get the rechargeable one, unless you use rechargeable batteries.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERTO PM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect speakers for the money
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my office and stream Pandora from my i-Pad. It sounds great and is reliable. I think I'm going to purchase another one for my home! I have a much more expensive sound system, but when I'm in the mood for portable and easy listening, this is the perfect choice. You can even take it outside because it has a rechargeable battery that is about the same size as your wireless home phone batteries.
customer_reviews.author: JMCalifornia

customer_reviews.title: Not Compatible with Windows 8
customer_reviews.text: I had this for about a year. The sound quality is EXCELLENT. Booming bass... enough to fill a hotel room to be like a party. However, it is breaking already. It does not stay on when not plugged in and most annoyingly it is not compatible with Windows 8. Sometimes it is difficult to connect to Bluetooth (hard to tell what it's doing bluetooth wise)
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Buy!
customer_reviews.text: We shopped around for awhile trying to decide what would work best with our iPhones. This is a great bluetooth speaker system. Easy to use and now we don't have to take our iPhones out of the case to listen to music! Especially love the fact that it is truly wireless, we can take it out on our balcony or wherever we want! Nice small size, but puts out great sound! The battery holds a charge for about 8 hours.
customer_reviews.author: vlmiller

customer_reviews.title: Great Price, Great Product
customer_reviews.text: The logitech bluetooth boombox is fantastic! I have no problem connecting it to my android phone automatically and I'm sure the iphone/pad would do the same. It sounds crystal clear, as opposed to an echo sound I hear from other bluetooth audio products. This thing charges, and holds a charge more than 6 hours. If you're not looking to blow the doors off with bass, this is the product for you. -GB
customer_reviews.author: g

customer_reviews.title: Good speaker for Android phones
customer_reviews.text: I connect the Logitech speaker to my RAZR and my wife's ATRIX. The pairing is easy and the sound is very nice. You're not going to run a rave from it, but poolside or sitting in your condo, it does a nice job of filling the area with sound. Decent bass response and the rechargeable battery goes a full afternoon on a charge. When connected to a power source, the speaker plays louder.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Cloninger

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound!
customer_reviews.text: A friend of mine had a Bose unit that he used on his houseboat so I started out looking for one like it. I ran across this unit and saw the positive reviews and took a chance. I have not been disappointed. The unit sounds just as good as the Bose and the battery life is good too The one thing Bose has over this, is the size. This unit is quite a bit longer/wider, but the price difference is worth it to me. Very nice unit!!
customer_reviews.author: Frontliner

customer_reviews.title: Great Bluetooth speaker
customer_reviews.text: I thought about getting some of the less expensive bluetooths out there but decided based on reviews I should get this bad boy. And I'm glad I did. Great sound, great battery life, incredibly easy to setup. Just a note, when you unplug the speaker the sound will drop a few decibels. This I assume is to save battery. No biggie, just turn it back up. Very happy with purchase. So go gets yourself one!!
customer_reviews.author: k

customer_reviews.title: and sound is great. Not to rehash the much more detailed reviews ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought used on Amazon for about $80. Bluetooth works well, and sound is great. Not to rehash the much more detailed reviews from other, but the sound is very full -- much more bass than expected. At higher volumes, it sounds "hard" or "forced", especially the bass, but for the size of the device nobody should expect the same sound you get from a 10" woofer. Good times.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Powell

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Blutooth speakers
customer_reviews.text: They sound great, it has 6 front speakers 2 of them for highs, and then two speakers on the back for lows, 8 speakers in total. Great sounding and pretty high volume without much distortion. I thought that due to the many speakers the battery wouldn’t last long but at a normal listening volume the batter will easily last more than 8 hours of continuous play. I would definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: chaix

customer_reviews.title: Better than the Bose, and at half the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought both, and although I liked the aesthetics of the Bose better, I, and my daughter preferred the sound of the Logitech. The Bose is a bit more portable, but I've taken the Logitech on trips now and find its size acceptable for my backpack. Finally, like many here have said, even if the price was the same I'd still go with the Logitech. At half the price, it's a no brain-er.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: great speaker !
customer_reviews.text: this little gem is completely worth the money. It is loud and clear we take it camping and it is plenty loud. We use it in the back yard and I have to tell my husband to turn it down so the neighbors do not complain. it is best with a plug in but works still very well with just the battery. We fight over it on who gets to take it with them :). Couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.author: Cindi Mills

customer_reviews.title: Lovelovelove!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product! I have owned it for awhile now and I use it all the time. the bluetooth works great as long as you figure out how far you can get. This is perfect for parties at my apartment so everyone can play a song from their phone without leaving their phone sitting across the room plugged into a speaker. I take this to the beach every single time and it is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: WOW!  Wonderful sound in a small package.
customer_reviews.text: I recently listened to the Bose SoundLink at Costco and thought it was kinda neat. I wanted to get something like this for my iPhone and iPad for streaming music. I then did a bunch of research and found the Logitech Wireless Boombox. This thing sounds GREAT! It also gets pretty loud. I'm really surprised at how natural and clean it sounds, and would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: evo311

customer_reviews.title: NOT what i was expecting from logitech. This speaker ...
customer_reviews.text: NOT what i was expecting from logitech. This speaker isn't even loud.. more of "cleaning the dishes and want something louder than my iphone itself" speaker. not only that, but the bass is weak and everything gets distorted at moderately high volumes.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect
customer_reviews.text: So far absolutely love this. It connects to our phones super easy, is very portable. I like the fact you dont need to plug it in to get great sound. The sound is very crisp, and it can get loud, which were both very important factors for me. We decided to spend a little more, and I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: sabby77

customer_reviews.title: Love these speakers
customer_reviews.text: I can connet them via Bluetooth to my Android phone and stream music, whether from music on my phone, Pandora or my Amazon cloud player. I can also plug in an audio cable and play music for any source. Excellent for the patio, or any place where you want to play music and not wear head phones.
customer_reviews.author: Hector

customer_reviews.title: Logitech Wireless Speaker
customer_reviews.text: Received my new Logitech Wireless Speaker about a month ago. It arrived faster than I was promised. I didn't take long to get it up and running. The sound is very good for a small speaker. I can here it throughout the house. Great sound with surprising base. Very happy with the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Dimaio

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Like many other reviewers, this item does exactly what's expected. It provides good sound (for the price). Bluetooth set up is a breeze. My only negative is when you disconnect from AC power, the sound degrades. I personally didn't buy this for portability, so it doesn't bother me that much. But if you plan to use it on battery mostly, just keep that in mind. Otherwise good product.
customer_reviews.author: erica

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: This little boombox is very impressive. The bass is just over the top, I didnt think this small thing would be that powerful. I work in a hosp where it gets pretty loud and crazy, and boy we all enjoy it, esp at night...just get it, you wont regret...IMO it is surpasses all Bose's products by far...dont get me wrong, i have bose's stuff but when it comes to boombox, logitech is the beast...
customer_reviews.author: Winnie the PoOh

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Speaker for the size.
customer_reviews.text: The first speaker was sent to me already opened and in a damaged box. Luckily the shipper accepted my return and sent a new speaker right away. This was a gift for my father in law and he absolutely loves it. It provides real good sound quality in a tiny package. Lows and high tones are very clear and punchy. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a good bluetooth speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Patti

customer_reviews.title: The Logitech iPad speaker thingy
customer_reviews.text: Simple to use, good full sound like the boom box it replaced. Problems: Doesn't come with a stand, so it just flops over unless you find something to prop it up with. I tried using my cat but she immediately runs away once I turn it on. The dog doesn't mind as much, but he's too big to fit on my bed stand. Also, since my mp3 player doesn't have a radio it might have been good to get one of these that have a radio, but if you don't need a radio this is a really good buy. I am a professional music producer and the sound quality is pretty good for the size and the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sheldon Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $, good quality for non-audiophile listeners
customer_reviews.text: Excellent and exactly what I was looking for as far as size and features to play music from my iPad... I love the portability. As other reviewers have stated, the volume/quality drops off noticeably when it's not plugged in (using battery power) but the battery feature is convenient enough that I'll forgive that. The only feature this product is missing is a *remote.* (I know... I'm such an American...) I would love to be able to adjust volume remotely while using it. Unless you're a serious audiophile, you'll appreciate this product for the quality you get for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Michelle Carnes

customer_reviews.title: Almost Flawless!
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase! I use to have the one with the dock in the middle but this one is way better! Portable & plays your music wirelessly... Genius! The only thing that would've made this perfect was if it was as loud while it's unplugged as when it's plugged. Still giving it 5 stars because it's exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: H2O

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, batteries last awhile
customer_reviews.text: I love the sound and portability of these speakers. The batteries last for a couple of hours on full blast and being rechargeable is great. The only downfall is that I bought it for my wife and now I have to listen to her music throughout the house. Need to find some great noise cancelling headphones now.
customer_reviews.author: Stina

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Since we own several different brands of cell phones and an iPod, we thought the BlueTooth option would work best. Instead of the iPod dock with remote, you can use your device as the remote, which is much easier. The sound is very good - not as much high end as I expected but nice full mid-low end sound. This is a perfect addition to the kitchen for my wife to listen while she cooks.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: I Love These Speakers!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned many Logitech products and I have become accustomed to their price and quality, this one does't disappoint. I am no audiophile, so the volume and quality is more than enough for the normal person. The sound quality does indeed diminish when running on battery power but is AWESOME when plugged in. I had planned to just use this at home but I have found it coming to the beach or camping every time I go. I would highly recommend this unit if you are looking for a nice Bluetooth set of speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Mediakiller

customer_reviews.title: it is OK !
customer_reviews.text: This is very good. But I have two questions: 1). When I connect the cell phone or other logitech not loaded. The logitech should charge the cell phone, ipod, ipad, another when this online. 2) Could I have information about a remote to control the logitech when I have the cell phone, ipod, logitech connected to another. If you are kind enough to give me that information. They can answer me the following email: "char24_dosramos@hotmail.com".Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: All Sink You Need

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use with Awesome Sound Quality.
customer_reviews.text: I mean what more can you ask for...the sound quality of this little system is pretty inspirational. I returned the Panasonic HC57 for this and I'm so glad I did...although the Panasonic unit had more features this thing blows it away for sound quality. If you max it out the speakers will distort but it's more than loud enough before then. I am most likely going to pick up another, I also love that you can unplug this baby and it works for up to 6hrs without any fuss or having to pick up batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Thai Q. Pham

customer_reviews.title: Good mobile sound device!
customer_reviews.text: I like it, but stop labeling it for Apple devices when it really works with any Bluetooth device, like my Android!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband as a Christmas present to take outside to listen to his favorite stations via his iPhone, via bluetooth. Works great, bluetooth hooked up with no problem, and connectivity between the distance from the speakers from phone via bluetooth was great, and most of all - it's compact for travel but puts out some awesome and impressive sound!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality for a reasonable price!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big fan of the Logitech Bluetooth Wireless Speaker. The sound is great and the price is better. The sound is not tin-like and has great bass. I'm really pleased with this speaker. The sound is better when the speaker is plugged in to a power source, but the differnce is minimal. I've recommended this speaker to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Mahalla

customer_reviews.title: Actually.....I'm surprised at how good this turned out to be!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and easy to connect via bluetooth. I'm using it with an Ipad. It wasn't cheap.....a bit overpriced perhaps. I did manage a $50 Amazon credit for mp3 purchases so I did as well as a person can. I'd buy this again. Now.....my hubby may want one with an ITouch and because he deserves a toy....I'll get it for him if he so chooses.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Marie

customer_reviews.title: This things is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I have searched high and low for a blue tooth speaker and i didn't have the cash to by a high dollar unit. Turns out i didn't have to. This thing puts out the sound. Works well on battery power even better plugged in. FYI; I use this speaker in a very loud work environment and i can still here my tunes over the running machines.
customer_reviews.author: mgesellschap

customer_reviews.title: Small Wonder
customer_reviews.text: I have an iPod and two iPads at home. This speaker set pairs so well with my iPod that my whole family has become Pandora fans now. I love watching movies on my iPad. I however find my bluetooth headset more comfortable for movie viewing. Again, its my personal choice because I like the theatrical effects I get while my headsets are on. What I like the most about Logitech Bluetooth Speakers? Freedom, no wires! wahoo!!
customer_reviews.author: Vijay Shriram

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I would definetly buy again, I have been buying Logitech products for a long time, And have always been satisfied with the quality and price.The speaker is just what I was looking for good sound,portable, can bring it anywhere. Easy to use, and plenty loud enough for in the room you are using it, and even outside.I know they have a newer model but I think this one might be better.If you buy this I know you will enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: HrdDrvnMn

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: This is really easy to set up. The sound while plugged in is amazing. Really pumps it out. While its unplugged, its not as powerful. If you're inside, its not an issue. But if you're outside, its not that good unless you're right next to it. Overall its a good item for the price
customer_reviews.author: W. Simmonds

customer_reviews.title: An excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound for a unit this diminutive. Battery is as expected. This unit excels at music at medium to loud volumes for music. At low volume for spoken audio (podcasts), it sounds slightly muddy. Fantastic for the kitchen, dining room. Compares favorably to the more expensive Jambox by Jawbone. Very pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Marty Z

customer_reviews.title: Durable!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this wireless speaker for about a year and is still gets the job done. I once even left it out in a rain shower and after it dried up (maybe a day later) I plugged it in and it worked! - yeah the sound isn't as good when its on battery power (that's why I took away one star) but I'm pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewed in Paradise

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value!
customer_reviews.text: I'm surprised Logitech markets this device only for iProducts. It works amazingly well with my Droid Razr. I am using doubleTwist, along w/ the Music Lover upgrade, which allows me to use their equalizer. I can also control volume w/ my phone. It has an amazing sound for the price and size. This is an excellent buy. I can't speak to the quality of the battery at this point, as I haven't had it long enough. I'd buy this product for this price w/out the battery, though.
customer_reviews.author: RickVA

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: Has been working well for a year now. I hook up all my iOS and android devices and it remembers everything ok. I love that it has all the buttons in the front (unlike the Creative boombox devices), its auxiliary input, and the in-built battery that works for a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: skypocket

customer_reviews.title: Very faulty product!
customer_reviews.text: I was so thrilled with this little speaker when I first got it--great sound for such a compact unit. Alas, it has taken to shutting down CONSTANTLY. I am returning it. I checked Logitech's site and many other customers are experiencing the same thing! Logitech won't respond. Very very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: J. McCort

customer_reviews.title: Works great with IPhone and Android!
customer_reviews.text: This product works great with an iPhone or an Android phone. The reception is incredible, it picks up the Bluetooth signal from my phone when I am upstairs and several rooms away. The speakers sound really good for their size. It's really warm in a medium sized room. Used it in a really large empty room with tile flooring and it sounded a little tinny, but you definitely get what you pay for and then some with these speakers. Also, the battery life is excellent. Just remember to charge it up the day before you go to the beach and you'll be alright. Can't go wrong with these!
customer_reviews.author: W. Breedlove III

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my windows tablet/AAC device. I should've never even hesitated to buy. These absolutely sound great. I looked at the jambox and bose soundlink also. The jambox was a little smaller and has a mic which is no use to me. The bose had good reviews too but was double the price. So boombox it was. It has just enough bass,imo, to give it a full and rich sound. The only problem i've had is the windows machine will lose connection even though it says it's connected. My apple ipad and iphone don't have that problem so it's probably stupid windows not handling the driver correctly. Highly recommend this!!
customer_reviews.author: Trent A. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it - highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great, plenty loud and can fill a large room, good sound. I use it often workshop, parties, outdoors, etc. Have used for about a year. Can be a bit tedious to get the devices to pair the first time. I have all the galaxy devices and an old xoom. But once paired it's a snap , it just works,
customer_reviews.author: J. Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, batteries won't last though...
customer_reviews.text: Great sound for the price, fills a room quite easily without even going to max volume. I've had these speakers for a couple of years now, and the only thing that I don't like is the batteries no longer hold a charge. I've seen tutorials online to swap them out and will likely do that in the future. Other than that, a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker
customer_reviews.text: This is a great speaker. Has great depth in the bass sound. It gets pretty loud with my droid x (Bluetooth) connected. I had to turn it down when my friend stopped by so we could hear each other. When plugged in you do get a bit more sound volume and bass depth. The battery life is very long. I used it for over 4 hours with no degradation.
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: Great sound - surprisingly deep bass. The only quibble would be its size. From the pictures, I thought it would be larger, but I don't see deducting a star for that; it's not small by any means, just smaller than I thought. Bought this for our son (14) and he loves it. Fits on his desk and easy connects wirelessly with his iPhone and iPad. Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Bopp

customer_reviews.title: We love this boombox!
customer_reviews.text: We have had a couple of docking station type boomboxes and it was always frustrating because it was hard to dock my ipod with the case on... being able to connect via bluetooth is fantastic. We can carry the ipod with us and change the song without having to walk back to the boombox. And it has great sound.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Smith (Arizona)

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I am no audiophile, but this produces full, crisp sound that belies its size. On AC anyway. On battery, the sound quality is greatly reduced. We never use it on battery though. It can be a little tricky switching from one device to another. But I think that's just the nature of bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: James Hauser

customer_reviews.title: Great value and sound
customer_reviews.text: I had chance to listen to this unit side by side with lots of others at a local electronics store before purchasing @ Amazon. Hey , it's not going to have the amazing full sound as a Bose, then again it won't set you back the $$$ of a Bose either. The sound is very full and crisp, and NOT tinny. It does sound better plugged into power vs the rechargeable battery too. The bluetooth is great. It took just a few seconds to synch my iPad and stream music. It comes with a cable to plug a non-Bluetooth player as well. I am VERY satisfied with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Deego

customer_reviews.title: This has been a great boombox! The battery will wear down so buy ...
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great boombox! The battery will wear down so buy a backup. I now carry two if I plan to play this for +4 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Jethro13

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good speaker sound system. The wireless works great. Very powerful and clear speakers. Battery lasts long. You can buy an extra battery booster on amazon for even longer play times. Only drawback is that it is only wireless. Can not attaché Ipod directly.
customer_reviews.author: Chip
